Source: Completing a Random Normal Dungeon or a Random Veteran Dungeon will give you bonus rewards once per day. During the event, you will also receive a Glorious Undaunted Reward Box alongside your bonus rewards.
Completing a Random Normal Dungeon or a Random Veteran Dungeon will give you bonus rewards once per day.\n\nThis is a test of the LFG Event System, and includes test-text for testers to test.
